channel.title: TPT Master Feed!
channel.itunes:subtitle: A master feed for all content from the 'That Podcast Thing' network.
channel.itunes:author: That Podcast Thing
channel.itunes:summary: A master feed for all the content from the 'That Podcast Thing' network. That Podcast Thing is both a podcast and a network, focused on mixing the silly and the serious. Current shows: Rachel & Andrew: That Podcast Thing, proFUN!dity podcast

channel.itunes:keywords: podcast, podcasts, technology, media, comedy, discussion, profundity, network

item.title: R&A, That Podcast Thing: Three, Two, One...PODCAST!
item.itunes:author: Rachel Perry & Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: Rachel's Podcast Origin Story
item.itunes:summary:
Internet fwiends Rachel Perry and Andrew Whipple decide to start a podcast...about podcasts. It's v. meta. PLUS, in this episode, we talk about Rachel's personal podcast origin story. Doesn't that sound all super-heroic? Origin story? Rachel is basically the Batman of Podcasts.

Rachel's Podcast Of The Week: Reply All, 'DMV Nation'

Andrew's Podcast Of The Week: We Have Concerns, '200 PC'

Find Us Elsewhere:

  • Rachel's Twitter: @shaylalunaspeak
  • Rachel's Tumblr: magicspellsinmoderntimes.tumblr.com
  • Andrew's Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip
  • andrewwhipple.com

Keep In Touch: RSS - iTunes -Twitter (@RachelAndrewPod) - Email (RachelAndrewPodcast@gmail.com)

  • Mugglenet - Mugglecast - Audiofictions
  • The Leaky Cauldron - Pottercast
  • 94.9 KUOW
  • 89.3 KPCC

item.title: proFUN!dity Episode F: From WBEZ Chicago
item.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: The podcast gets meta.
item.itunes:summary:
Act One: Sarah Koenig discusses campus housing. Act Two: Sarah Koenig on the nature of Apple fanboyism. Act Three: Nightmare Before Christmas? Sarah Koenig investigates. Act Four: We try to remember a This American Life contributer that isn't Sarah Koenig.

Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip

!

item.title: proFUN!dity Episode E: *Sexy Pen Click Noise*
item.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: The podcast reminisces.
item.itunes:summary:
A post-mortem. A retrospective. A check-in. Other words that could describe a scenario whereby I spend an hour dissecting and discussing what it was like to GO TO A TAYLOR SWIFT CONCERT OH MY GOD GUYS.

Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip

!

item.title: proFUN!dity Episode D: Audience Surrogate
item.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: The podcast returns to form.
item.itunes:summary:
I've got one thing to talk to y'all about. Just wait. It's a real good topic.

Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip

!

item.title: proFUN!dity Episode C: SCOPIN'
item.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: The podcast gets visual.
item.itunes:summary:
This may very well be unlistenable, but that's okay because the LIVESTREAMED PERISCOPE THAT HAPPENED DURING RECORDING was probably also unwatchable. Discussions about podcasts, Southern Gothic Literature, and ethical consumerism, all while getting VERY DISTRACTED BY, AGAIN, THE PERISCOPIN'.

Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip

!

item.title: proFUN!dity Episode B: Carly Bae Jepsen
item.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: The podcast takes you to the feeling.
item.itunes:summary:
This is it, ladies and gentlemen, strap in your seatbelt and BUCKLE THE FRICK UP BECAUSE WE'RE TALKING ABOUT ONE* THING AND ONE THING ONLY** TONIGHT.

*Well, not just one thing, because tangents.

**Yeah. A heck o' a lot o' tangents.

Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip

!

item.title: proFUN!dity Episode A: Radio Reset
item.itunes:author: Andrew Whipple
item.itunes:subtitle: The podcast resets.
item.itunes:summary:
MICROPHONES! APARTMENTS! NIHILIST CLOWNS! THE DAMNWELLS! PURPOSEFULLY AVOIDING TALKING ABOUT PERSONAL STUFF! LIVE TROUBLESHOOTING! HELL YEAH.

Twitter: @AndrewTheWhip
